forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 31, with temperatures falling to around 23 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers between 7pm and 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. Southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Skiing is awesome with a 24" base of natural snow and daily power tilling.  All trails are open.  Save $20 on race registration by registering online at SKIREG.com by 10 pm tonight!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck’s Run is groomed for skate and classic with great coverage. Contractor’s Loop was in OK shape with full coverage but had not been groomed today. The trails on the course were wind blown and not groomed today.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, conveyor and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning conditions are excellent.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m. There is a special night skiing session this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It would be difficult to improve the conditions today. Over four inches of new snow fell since yesterday morning and it continued to snow last evening. The snow surface is soft corduroy this morning. All the ski runs, parks, glades, XC trails and snowshoe trails are in premium shape. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is white chicken chili. NASTAR racing on Birch Run at 12:30 p.m. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great Saturday at Nub's Nob.
